name: FFLivekit
summary: This is a live streaming FFmpeg based package to publish the live streams to RTMP or RTSP servers
description: FFLivekit is a robust live streaming package that seamlessly integrates with FFmpeg to enable the effortless publishing of live streams to RTMP (Real-Time Messaging Protocol) or RTSP (Real-Time Streaming Protocol) servers. Leveraging the powerful capabilities of FFmpeg, this package empowers developers to create high-quality, real-time video broadcasts with ease. Whether you're building a live streaming platform, video conferencing application, or any real-time video communication tool, FFLivekit simplifies the integration of live streaming features, providing a reliable solution for delivering dynamic content to your audience.
